name: Deja Vu (Kostiantyn Dvornik)
description:
"Deja Vu"  

Game about your life, about your neighbor life, or anyone else.  If you doing something with repetitive way you will make it perfect. Except your mental health. 

This project was made in Bitsy 

I've made this game as part of the Game Design Course that I study. If you've liked it, please also check works of my colleagues:

How I make games by Valerii Petrov (eng)

Let's make a game, how do we make a game by Hullche (rus)

Epic construction by Mich-hn (rus)

История одной боли by Dahuanna (rus)
